resources.string: Please enter your recovery seed and the wallet\'s creation date (helps with faster chain sync)
Keep this next set of words secret. Without it you won\'t be able to recover your wallet!
Open source wallet app with no third - party servers to manage your wallet. Other currencies planned to be added...
If you would like to contribute or create your own flavour of the wallet... You can find repository here : https://github.com/ehanoc/xwallet
